root.name: Bionic Battler
root.description: Overview Bionic Battler is an action game developed by Toei Animation released on the original Game Boy in 1992. In Bionic Battler there are two playable characters and five different levels to play in. The levels in Bionic Battler are comprised of maze like structures and the goal is to destroy the other mechs that occupy the maze. Bionic Battler supports one or two players.
